subject: Football
Heisman Trophy
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Ohio State quarterback Troy Smith is expected to be the runaway winner of the Heisman Trophy. But if his margin of victory is the largest ever, it could foster a debate over the merits of that distinction.
snippet: Ohio State quarterback Troy Smith is expected to be the runaway winner of the Heisman Trophy. But if his margin of victory is the largest ever, it could foster a debate over the merits of that distinction.
